name: War Operations
description: Try to get out alive in this epic game of War and Destruction!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 95/98/XP/Vista/7 Processor: 800 Mhz Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 50 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The A.I are too good!  - shot me through a building - unlimited shooting range   I don't even know why this is even on steam.
Great.... Another game infecting my steam library.
This is worse that horrible. I would rather pull Bill Oddie out of my eye socket than play this again. Also, in what universe is this an FPS!?
Best game ever: very deep story line, Top notch FPS action, Strategic gameplay... Oh wait. That's right! This isn't Counter Strike?! Oh well. Still better than CallOfDuty.       10.5/10 -IGN
Best game ever (better than Battle field)
